snippet.title: Buccaneers! Announcement Trailer (Pre-release)
snippet.description:
Become a fearless captain in Buccaneers!, a classic pirate game with a modern twist.
(This trailer uses pre-release footage; the final game features many graphical and gameplay improvements not shown here. This music is not featured in the original soundtrack.)

The game has full VR support but does not require a VR headset to play.

Available now on PC! Buy the game here:
- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1148560/Buccaneers/?utm_source=youtube
- GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/buccaneers

Listen to the Buccaneers! Original Soundtrack on all major streaming services including Spotify, iTunes, Amazon and many more!

Join the Skyward Digital Discord and ask the devs anything: https://discord.gg/rA6ggtJ8PH
